sub_title: Partner and Head of German Desk at Heussen lawyers & civil law notaries
summary: I am a banking & finance attorney, specialised in advising (inter)national companies and financial institutions in financing transactions (both domestic and international), and have extensive experience with securitisations, structured finance transactions, and corporate law. As a German native speaker and manager of the German Desk, my practice is particularly focused on the German market.
